verses.verse: Now it fell upon a day <S%H3117><s%>, that Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the young man <S%H5288><s%> that bare <S%H5375><s%> his armor <S%H3627><s%>, Come <S%H3212><s%>, and let us go over <S%H5674><s%> to the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>' garrison <S%H4673><s%>, that is on yonder side <S%H5676><s%>. But he told <S%H5046><s%> not his father <S%H1><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> abode <S%H3427><s%> in the uttermost <S%H7097><s%> part of Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> under the pomegranate-tree <S%H7416><s%> which is in Migron <S%H4051><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him were about six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%>;

and Ahijah <S%H281><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahitub <S%H285><s%>, Ichabod <S%H350><s%>'s brother <S%H251><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Phinehas <S%H6372><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eli <S%H5941><s%>, the priest <S%H3548><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in Shiloh <S%H7887><s%>, wearing <S%H5375><s%> an ephod <S%H646><s%>. And the people <S%H5971><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not that Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> was gone <S%H1980><s%>.

And between the passes <S%H4569><s%>, by which Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> to go over <S%H5674><s%> unto the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>' garrison <S%H4673><s%>, there was a rocky <S%H5553><s%> crag <S%H8127><s%> on the one side <S%H5676><s%>, and a rocky <S%H5553><s%> crag <S%H8127><s%> on the other side <S%H5676><s%>: and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Bozez <S%H949><s%>, and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H259><s%> Seneh <S%H5573><s%>.

The one <S%H259><s%> crag <S%H8127><s%> rose up <S%H4690><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> in front <S%H8127><s%> of Michmash <S%H4363><s%>, and the other <S%H259><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%> in front <S%H4136><s%> of Geba <S%H1387><s%>.

And Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the young man <S%H5288><s%> that bare <S%H5375><s%> his armor <S%H3627><s%>, Come <S%H3212><s%>, and let us go over <S%H5674><s%> unto the garrison <S%H4673><s%> of these uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%>: it may be that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will work <S%H6213><s%> for us <S%H4622><s%>; for there is no restraint to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> by many <S%H7227><s%> or by few <S%H4592><s%>.

And his armorbearer <S%H5375><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H6213><s%>, Do all that is in thy heart <S%H3824><s%>: turn <S%H5186><s%> thee <S%H3824><s%>, behold, I am with thee according to thy heart.
Then said <S%H559><s%> Jonathan <S%H3083><s%>, Behold <S%H5674><s%>, we will pass over unto the men <S%H582><s%>, and we will disclose ourselves unto them <S%H1540><s%>.
If they say <S%H559><s%> thus unto us <S%H1826><s%>, Tarry until we come <S%H5060><s%> to you <S%H5975><s%>; then we will stand still in our place <S%H5927><s%>, and will not go up unto them.

But if they say <S%H559><s%> thus <S%H5927><s%>, Come up unto us <S%H5927><s%>; then we will go up; for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into our hand <S%H3027><s%>: and this shall be the sign unto us <S%H226><s%>.

And both <S%H8147><s%> of them disclosed <S%H1540><s%> themselves unto the garrison <S%H4673><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>: and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H5680><s%>, the Hebrews come forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the holes <S%H2356><s%> where they had hid themselves <S%H2244><s%>.

And the men <S%H582><s%> of the garrison <S%H4675><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> and his armorbearer <S%H5375><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Come up <S%H5927><s%> to us <S%H3045><s%>, and we will show you a thing <S%H1697><s%>. And Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his armorbearer <S%H5375><s%>, Come up <S%H5927><s%> after <S%H310><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>; for Jehovah hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> climbed up <S%H5927><s%> upon his hands <S%H3027><s%> and upon his feet <S%H7272><s%>, and his armorbearer <S%H5375><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him <S%H5307><s%>: and they fell before <S%H6440><s%> Jonathan <S%H3129><s%>; and his armorbearer <S%H5375><s%> slew <S%H4191><s%> them after him <S%H310><s%>.

And that first <S%H7223><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%>, which Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> and his armorbearer <S%H5375><s%> made <S%H5221><s%>, was about twenty <S%H6242><s%> men <S%H376><s%>, within as it were half <S%H2677><s%> a furrow <S%H6776><s%>'s length in an acre <S%H4618><s%> of land <S%H7704><s%>.

And there was a trembling <S%H2731><s%> in the camp <S%H4264><s%>, in the field <S%H7704><s%>, and among all the people <S%H5971><s%>; the garrison <S%H4673><s%>, and the spoilers <S%H7843><s%>, they also trembled <S%H2729><s%>; and the earth <S%H776><s%> quaked <S%H7264><s%>: so there was an exceeding great <S%H430><s%> trembling <S%H2731><s%>.

And the watchmen <S%H6822><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> in Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> looked <S%H7200><s%>; and <S%H1995><s%>, behold, the multitude melted away <S%H4127><s%>, and they went <S%H3212><s%> hither and thither <S%H1986><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him <S%H6485><s%>, Number now <S%H7200><s%>, and see who is gone <S%H1980><s%> from us <S%H6485><s%>. And when they had numbered, behold <S%H3129><s%>, Jonathan and his armorbearer were not there <S%H5375><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Ahijah <S%H281><s%>, Bring hither <S%H5066><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>. For the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was there at that time <S%H3117><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H7586><s%>, while Saul talked <S%H1696><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%>, that the tumult <S%H1995><s%> that was in the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> on <S%H1980><s%> and increased <S%H7227><s%>: and Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%>, Withdraw <S%H622><s%> thy hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> and all the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him were gathered <S%H2199><s%> together <S%H935><s%>, and came to the battle <S%H4421><s%>: and <S%H376><s%>, behold, every man's sword <S%H2719><s%> was against his fellow <S%H7453><s%>, and there was a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> discomfiture <S%H4103><s%>.

Now the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> that were with the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> as <S%H8032><s%> beforetime <S%H865><s%>, and that went up <S%H5927><s%> with them into the camp <S%H4264><s%>, from the country round about <S%H5439><s%>, even they also turned to be with the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> that were with Saul <S%H7586><s%> and Jonathan <S%H3129><s%>.

Likewise all the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that had hid <S%H2244><s%> themselves in the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, when they heard <S%H8085><s%> that the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%>, even they also followed hard <S%H1692><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them in the battle <S%H4421><s%>.
So Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%>: and the battle <S%H4421><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> by Beth-aven <S%H1007><s%>.

And the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were distressed <S%H5065><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%>; for Saul <S%H7586><s%> had adjured <S%H422><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the man <S%H376><s%> that eateth <S%H398><s%> any food <S%H3899><s%> until it be evening <S%H6153><s%>, and I be avenged <S%H5358><s%> on mine enemies <S%H341><s%>. So none of the people <S%H5971><s%> tasted <S%H2938><s%> food <S%H3899><s%>.
And all the people <S%H776><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into the forest <S%H3293><s%>; and there was honey <S%H1706><s%> upon <S%H6440><s%> the ground <S%H7704><s%>.

And when the people <S%H5971><s%> were come <S%H935><s%> unto the forest <S%H3293><s%>, behold <S%H1706><s%>, the honey dropped <S%H1982><s%>: but no man put <S%H5381><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> to his mouth <S%H6310><s%>; for the people <S%H5971><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> the oath <S%H7621><s%>.

But Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> not when his father <S%H1><s%> charged <S%H7650><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with the oath <S%H7650><s%>: wherefore he put forth <S%H7971><s%> the end <S%H7097><s%> of the rod <S%H4294><s%> that was in his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and dipped <S%H2881><s%> it in the honeycomb <S%H3295><s%>, and put <S%H7725><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> to his mouth <S%H6310><s%>; and his eyes <S%H5869><s%> were enlightened <S%H215><s%>.

Then answered <S%H6030><s%> one <S%H376><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Thy father <S%H1><s%> straitly <S%H7650><s%> charged <S%H7650><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with an oath <S%H7650><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the man <S%H376><s%> that eateth <S%H398><s%> food <S%H3899><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>. And the people <S%H5971><s%> were faint <S%H5774><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> Jonathan <S%H3129><s%>, My father <S%H1><s%> hath troubled <S%H5916><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>: see <S%H7200><s%>, I pray you <S%H5869><s%>, how mine eyes have been enlightened <S%H215><s%>, because I tasted <S%H2938><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> of this honey <S%H1706><s%>.

How much more <S%H637><s%>, if haply <S%H3863><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> had eaten <S%H398><s%> freely <S%H398><s%> to-day <S%H3117><s%> of the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> which they found <S%H4672><s%>? for now hath there been no great <S%H7235><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%> among the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>.

And they smote <S%H5221><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> from Michmash <S%H4363><s%> to Aijalon <S%H357><s%>. And the people <S%H5971><s%> were very <S%H3966><s%> faint <S%H5774><s%>;

and the people <S%H5971><s%> flew <S%H5860><s%> upon the spoil <S%H7998><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and oxen <S%H1241><s%>, and calves <S%H1121><s%>, and slew <S%H7819><s%> them on the ground <S%H776><s%>; and the people <S%H5971><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> them with the blood <S%H1818><s%>.

Then they told <S%H5046><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H5971><s%>, the people sin <S%H2398><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, in that they eat <S%H398><s%> with the blood <S%H1818><s%>. And he said <S%H559><s%>, ye have dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%>: roll <S%H1556><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> unto me this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Disperse <S%H6327><s%> yourselves among the people <S%H5971><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H5066><s%>, Bring me hither every man <S%H376><s%> his ox <S%H7794><s%>, and every man <S%H376><s%> his sheep <S%H7716><s%>, and slay <S%H7819><s%> them here <S%H398><s%>, and eat; and sin <S%H2398><s%> not against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in eating <S%H398><s%> with the blood <S%H1818><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> brought <S%H5066><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his ox <S%H7794><s%> with him <S%H3027><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%>, and slew them there <S%H7819><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: the same was the first <S%H2490><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> that he built <S%H1129><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Let us go down <S%H3381><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>, and take spoil <S%H962><s%> among them until the morning <S%H1242><s%> light <S%H216><s%>, and let us not leave <S%H7604><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of them <S%H559><s%>. And they said, Do <S%H6213><s%> whatsoever seemeth <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> unto thee <S%H559><s%>. Then said the priest <S%H3548><s%>, Let us draw near <S%H7126><s%> hither <S%H1988><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> counsel of God <S%H430><s%>, Shall I go down <S%H3381><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>? wilt thou deliver <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>? But he answered <S%H6030><s%> him not that day <S%H3117><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Draw nigh <S%H5066><s%> hither <S%H1988><s%>, all ye chiefs <S%H6438><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>; and know <S%H3045><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> wherein <S%H4100><s%> this sin <S%H2403><s%> hath been this day <S%H3117><s%>.

For <S%H3068><s%>, as Jehovah liveth <S%H2416><s%>, who saveth <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, though it be <S%H3426><s%> in Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%>, he shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%>. But there was not a man among all the people <S%H5971><s%> that answered him <S%H6030><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Be ye on one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H5676><s%>, and I and Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> will be on the other <S%H259><s%> side <S%H5676><s%>. And the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Saul <S%H7586><s%>, Do <S%H6213><s%> what seemeth <S%H5869><s%> good unto thee <S%H2896><s%>.

Therefore Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Show <S%H3051><s%> the right <S%H8549><s%>. And Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> and Saul <S%H7586><s%> were taken <S%H3920><s%> by lot <S%H5971><s%>; but the people escaped <S%H3318><s%>.
And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Cast <S%H5307><s%> lots between me and Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%>. And Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> was taken <S%H3920><s%>.

Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jonathan <S%H3129><s%>, Tell <S%H5046><s%> me what thou hast done <S%H6213><s%>. And Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, and said, I did certainly <S%H2938><s%> taste <S%H2938><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> honey <S%H1706><s%> with the end <S%H7097><s%> of the rod <S%H4294><s%> that was in my hand <S%H3027><s%>; and <S%H2009><s%>, lo, I must die <S%H4191><s%>.
And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> do so <S%H6213><s%> and more also <S%H3254><s%>; for thou shalt surely <S%H4191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%>, Jonathan <S%H3129><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Saul <S%H7586><s%>, Shall Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> die <S%H4191><s%>, who hath wrought <S%H6213><s%> this great <S%H1419><s%> salvation <S%H3444><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>? Far <S%H2486><s%> from it <S%H3068><s%>: as Jehovah liveth <S%H2416><s%>, there shall not one hair <S%H8185><s%> of his head <S%H7218><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>; for he hath wrought <S%H6213><s%> with God <S%H430><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>. So the people <S%H5971><s%> rescued <S%H6299><s%> Jonathan <S%H3129><s%>, that he died not <S%H4191><s%>.
Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>; and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to their own place <S%H4725><s%>.

Now when Saul <S%H7586><s%> had taken <S%H3920><s%> the kingdom <S%H4410><s%> over Israel <S%H3478><s%>, he fought <S%H3898><s%> against all his enemies <S%H341><s%> on every side <S%H5439><s%>, against Moab <S%H4124><s%>, and against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>, and against Edom <S%H123><s%>, and against the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Zobah <S%H6678><s%>, and against the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>: and whithersoever he turned <S%H6437><s%> himself <S%H7561><s%>, he put them to the worse.

And he did <S%H6213><s%> valiantly <S%H2428><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> the Amalekites <S%H6002><s%>, and delivered <S%H5337><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of them that despoiled them <S%H8154><s%>.

Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> were Jonathan <S%H3129><s%>, and Ishvi <S%H3440><s%>, and Malchi-shua <S%H4444><s%>; and the names <S%H8034><s%> of his two <S%H8147><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> were these <S%H8034><s%>: the name of the first-born <S%H1067><s%> Merab <S%H4764><s%>, and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the younger <S%H6996><s%> Michal <S%H4324><s%>:

and the name <S%H8034><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> was Ahinoam <S%H293><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Ahimaaz <S%H290><s%>. And the name <S%H8034><s%> of the captain <S%H8269><s%> of his host <S%H6635><s%> was Abner <S%H74><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ner <S%H5369><s%>, Saul <S%H7586><s%>'s uncle <S%H1730><s%>.
And Kish <S%H7027><s%> was the father <S%H1><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>; and Ner <S%H5369><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Abner <S%H74><s%> was the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abiel <S%H22><s%>.

And there was sore <S%H2389><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> against the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>: and when Saul <S%H7586><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> any mighty <S%H1368><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, or any valiant <S%H2428><s%> man <S%H1121><s%>, he took him unto him <S%H622><s%>.
